author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Heat the olive oil in a pan and add the potatoes, vinegar and paprika and cook until golden. Finish by adding the tomato ketchup, tomato purée and honey. Cook for three more minutes. Transfer to a plate and serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  100g/3½oz new potatoes, cooked and cut into quarters ,  1 tbsp red wine vinegar,  ½ tsp paprika,  1 tbsp tomato ketchup,  ½ tsp tomato purée,  1 tbsp honey
